data.title: Boot Camp Clik
data.meta_description: Boot Camp Clik is an American hip hop supergroup from Brooklyn, New York. The group is composed of Buckshot, Smif-n-Wessun (Tek and Steele), O.G.C. (Starang Wondah, Top Dog and Louieville Sluggah) and Heltah Skeltah (Rock and Sean Price). All of its members are from the Brownsville section of...
data.text:
Origin

Brooklyn, New York, United States

Genre

Hip hop, East Coast hip hop, hardcore hip hop

Years active

1993-1999, 2002-present

Labels

Duck Down

Associated acts

9th Wonder, Da Beatminerz, Black Moon, Brand Nubian, Heltah Skeltah, KRS-One, Mobb Deep, Nottz, O.G.C., Outlawz, Representativz, Wu-Tang Clan

Members

Buckshot

Louieville Sluggah

Rock

Starang Wondah

Steele

Tek

Top Dog

Past members

Sean Price (deceased)

Boot Camp Clik is an American hip hop supergroup from Brooklyn, New York. The group is composed of Buckshot, Smif-n-Wessun (Tek and Steele), O.G.C. (Starang Wondah, Top Dog and Louieville Sluggah) and Heltah Skeltah (Rock and Sean Price). All of its members are from the Brownsville section of Brooklyn, in addition to Buckshot, who is from the Crown Heights section, and Tek, who is from the Bedford-Stuyvesant section.

Discography[]
